translation: If the button does not work, copy and paste the following link into your browser:

Thank you for registering at {{ .AppName }}.
To activate your account, click the button below:

one:
This link will be active for the next day.
After that, the account will be automatically deleted.
other:
This link will be active for the next {{ .ExpiryDays }} days.
After that, the account will be automatically deleted.

translation: If you did not create this account, please ignore this message or contact us.
We received a request to change the email address associated with your account.
To confirm the new address, click the button below:

one: This link will be active for the next day.
other: This link will be active for the next {{ .ExpiryDays }} days.

translation: If you did not initiate this email change, please ignore this message. Your address will not be changed.
We received a request to reset the password for your account.
To reset your password, click the button below:

one: This link will be active for the next day.
other: This link will be active for the next {{ .ExpiryDays }} days.

translation: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this message. Your password will remain unchanged.
